text: South Pelion (, Notio Pilio) is a municipality in the Magnesia regional unit, Thessaly, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Argalasti.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 368.539 km2. It comprises the southern part of Mount Pelion. ==Municipality== The municipality South Pelion was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 5 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Afetes *Argalasti *Milies *Sipiada *Trikeri ==References== Category:Municipalities of Thessaly Category:Pelion
title: South Pelion
